data.name: NMR Beta (OFFLINE) - Full game on Meta Quest Store (Link in description)
data.app_name: NMR Beta (OFFLINE) - Full game on Meta Quest Store (Link in description)
data.description:
The beta is OFFLINE!  

You must now buy the full version on the Official Quest Store here: ocul.us/45b4D00

-

The Beta is OFFLINE. Stay updated by joining our Discord:

discord.squidostudio.com

changelog.change_log:
Bug Fixing
- Fixed an issue where players would fall through the map.
- When players left the game, their character model would sometimes stay in the lobby.

Known bugs
- Pinatas sometimes stop spawning for an entire round.
- Power ups sometimes stop spawning for an entire round.
- Teams are sometimes unbalanced.

Team Rampage changes

- Maximum team size has been reduced from 4 to 3 players per team.

- Each team now waits inside their own locked cage until the game starts.

- 2 new powerups added!

Multiplayer Maps 

- New multiplayer lobby!

- Infernal arena maps visual style changed.

- New world 2 map added.

Misc 

New voting feature added.

- Quickplay now creates a room if there are no available rooms.

- Pausing does not freeze players anymore.

- Other small visual changes and fixes.
Fixed an NPC trapped in a wall.

Team Rampage Mode
- Up to 4 players per team
- 5 minute rounds
- Best out of 3 rounds
- 20 Pinatas to win

3 new maps
- Infernal Arenas added
- World 1 maps removed

Misc
- Mysterious spicy power added
- Moderators now shown beside their username
- You cannot join a game with a round started with an even number of players. (Ex : 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2, 3 vs 3, 4 vs 4)

Known bugs
- Sometimes the pinatas no longer appear. (Workaround: The host need to change the map)
- Sometimes you can't take the blueberries.
Bug fix for the multplayer button.
Bug fix for the unavailable multiplayer button.
